/*selectScheduleList 스케줄러 조회*/ SELECT SCH_IDX as groupId, SCH_TITLE, SCH_CONT, SCH_WRITER, SCH_CREATE_DTTM, SCH_CURRENTMONTH, SCH_START, SCH_END, DATE_ADD(SCH_START, INTERVAL 9 HOUR) AS SCH_START_UTC, DATE_ADD(SCH_END, INTERVAL 9 HOUR) AS SCH_END_UTC, SCH_COLOR , SCH_DELYN, SCH_SENDYN FROM MT_SCHEDULE WHERE 1=1 AND SCH_DELYN = 'N' AND SCH_CURRENTMONTH = #{SCH_CURRENTMONTH}
AND SCH_START like CONCAT('%', #{SCH_TODAY}, '%')

/*selectScheduleInfo 스케줄러 단건조회*/ SELECT SCH_IDX, SCH_TITLE, SCH_CONT, SCH_WRITER, SCH_CURRENTMONTH, SCH_COLOR, DATE_FORMAT(SCH_CREATE_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SCH_CREATE_DTTM, DATE_FORMAT(SCH_START, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SCH_START, DATE_FORMAT(SCH_END, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SCH_END FROM MT_SCHEDULE WHERE 1=1 AND SCH_IDX = #{SCH_IDX}
mapper.insert: /*insertSchedule 스케줄러 작성*/ INSERT INTO MT_SCHEDULE( SCH_TITLE, SCH_CONT, SCH_WRITER, SCH_CREATE_DTTM, SCH_CURRENTMONTH, SCH_START, SCH_END, SCH_COLOR, SCH_DELYN, SCH_SENDYN )VALUES ( #{SCH_TITLE}, #{SCH_CONT}, #{SCH_WRITER}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{SCH_CURRENTMONTH}, #{SCH_START}, #{SCH_END}, #{SCH_COLOR}, 'N', 'N' )
mapper.select: /*selectTodaySchedule 스케줄 당일일정 조회*/ SELECT A.*, B.MBTLNUM FROM MT_SCHEDULE A LEFT JOIN MT_LETTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.SCH_WRITER = B.EMPLYR_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.SCH_DELYN = 'N' AND A.SCH_SENDYN = 'N' AND DATE(A.SCH_START) = (SELECT CURDATE())

/*selectTomorrowSchedule 스케줄 일정 조회(1일전 조회)*/ SELECT A.*, B.MBTLNUM FROM MT_SCHEDULE A LEFT JOIN MT_LETTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.SCH_WRITER = B.EMPLYR_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.SCH_DELYN = 'N' AND A.SCH_SENDYN = 'N' AND DATE(A.SCH_START) = (SELECT ADDDATE(CURDATE(), 1))

/*selectThreeDaysSchedule 스케줄러 일정 조회(3일전 조회)*/ SELECT A.*, B.MBTLNUM FROM MT_SCHEDULE A LEFT JOIN MT_LETTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.SCH_WRITER = B.EMPLYR_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.SCH_DELYN = 'N' AND A.SCH_SENDYN = 'N' AND DATE(A.SCH_START) = (SELECT ADDDATE(CURDATE(), 3))

/*selectAWeekSchedule 스케줄러 일정알림 조회(7일전 미리조회)*/ SELECT A.*, B.MBTLNUM FROM MT_SCHEDULE A LEFT JOIN MT_LETTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.SCH_WRITER = B.EMPLYR_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.SCH_DELYN = 'N' AND A.SCH_SENDYN = 'N' AND DATE(A.SCH_START) = (SELECT ADDDATE(CURDATE(), 7))
